channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Templating Engine Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Templating Engine Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-21646|2024-08-03T18:16:23.698Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20templating%20engine%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Templating Engine Plugin 2.1 and earlier does not protect its pipeline configurations using Script Security Plugin, allowing attackers with Job/Configure permission to execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.
